articles.author: David Goldman
articles.title: Trump’s affordability argument just got the unlikeliest champion - CNN
articles.description: The main reason Americans are upset about the economy: They are still adjusting to high prices that surged during years of runaway inflation that took place during former President Joe Biden’s term.
articles.content:
The main reason Americans are upset about the economy: They are still adjusting to high prices that surged during years of runaway inflation that took place during former President Joe Bidens term.
